original_text: And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.
korean_text: 향연이 성도의 기도와 함께 천사의 손으로부터 하나님 앞으로 올라가는지라

sentences.original_text: And smoke of the incense ascended up
which came with the prayers of the saints
before God out of the angel's hand
